name: JigSaw Abundance
description:
Now with more themes and puzzles!
*10 different themes to choose from
*4 different difficulty size to adjust any time during playing
*50 high quality puzzle images.
*Soft, relaxing and cheerful music
*Ability to adjust background themes.

1 player
300MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
